title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your intentions are admirable, and your actions are likely motivated by a strong desire to help rather than to receive praise. Nevertheless, its nice to know that your support is respected and valued. You might feel uncomfortable expressing your dissatisfaction with a colleagues lack of appreciation for your assistance. Thankfully, clearing the air strengthens the connection. Sometimes, it takes people time to work through their emotions, like guilt or shame, to experience genuine gratitude. Be patient and understanding with their process. Artist Elbert Hubbard wrote, An ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
